DishDescription: Date & black treacle sponge, West Country butter toffee sauce and vanilla custard

Berry compote, Jude’s strawberry ice cream,
whipped cream, soft meringue and strawberry sauce
Traditional tart with coconut ice cream

Chocolate brownie, salted caramel and chocolate fudge,
topped with brownie bits, salted caramel sauce
with Jude’s vanilla ice cream

Apple and mixed fruit crumble with a buttery
flapjack topping, served with a creamy custard

Chocolate biscuit base, dark chocolate ganache and
peanut butter mousse finished with roasted peanuts and
white chocolate curls. Served with cream or ice cream
